content.rendered:
Overview

Study project during "IUT Informatique" from 1996 to 1998: Dos library in C and Assembler allowing the management of memory, input peripherals and a SVGA multi-window interface, used to develop in C ++ an animation engine of 3D objects and virtual worlds in wireframe, shading and gouraud.

YouTube

The video contains strobe images
